data.eml:eml: Larva and pupa of Ctesias (s. str.) serra (Fabricius, 1792) with remarks on biology and economic importance, and larval comparison of co-occurring genera (Coleoptera, Dermestidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kadej, Marcin (2018): Larva and pupa of Ctesias (s. str.) serra (Fabricius, 1792) with remarks on biology and economic importance, and larval comparison of co-occurring genera (Coleoptera, Dermestidae). ZooKeys 758: 115-135, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.758.24477, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.758.24477
